questions.question: Tell me about a time when you had to deal with a difficult team member. How did you handle it?
tips: Use the STAR method (Situation, Task, Action, Result)
Focus on your communication and conflict resolution skills

questions.question: Describe a situation where you had to meet a tight deadline. What did you do?
tips: Show how you stayed organized under pressure
Mention any trade-offs you had to make

questions.question: Give an example of a time you failed. What did you learn from it?
tips: Be honest but don't dwell on the failure
Focus more on what you learned
Show how you applied that learning later

questions.question: Tell me about a time when you had to convince someone to see things your way.
tips: Show your persuasion and negotiation skills
Highlight your ability to build consensus

questions.question: Describe a project you're most proud of. Why?
tips: Choose a project with measurable impact

questions.question: Explain the difference between let, const, and var in JavaScript.
tips: Explain when to use each one

questions.question: What is the difference between == and === in JavaScript?
How does the event loop work in JavaScript?
tips: Explain call stack, callback queue, and event loop
Give examples with setTimeout and Promises

questions.question: What is a closure in JavaScript? Give an example.
tips: Define closure as function + lexical environment
Show practical use case (data privacy, factory functions)

questions.question: Explain the difference between SQL and NoSQL databases.
tips: Give use cases for each type

questions.question: Describe a time when you received negative feedback. How did you respond?
tips: Focus on how you acted on the feedback

questions.question: Tell me about a time you had to make a decision without all the information you needed.
tips: Mention how you gathered available information

questions.question: What is the difference between GET and POST requests?
Explain RESTful API design principles.
tips: Mention HTTP methods and status codes

questions.question: What is the difference between authentication and authorization?
Describe a situation where you had to learn a new technology quickly.
tips: Highlight how you applied it successfully

questions.question: What is the purpose of Git and how do you resolve merge conflicts?
tips: Mention best practices (small commits, frequent pulls)

questions.question: Explain the concept of Big O notation and why it matters.
tips: Give examples: O(1), O(n), O(log n), O(nÂ²)
Explain why it matters for scalability

questions.question: Tell me about a time when you had to handle multiple priorities at once.
tips: Explain how you communicated with stakeholders

questions.question: Describe a time when you went above and beyond what was expected.
tips: Highlight the impact of your extra effort
